metadata.Title: CVE-2020-13170 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
HashiCorp Consul and Consul Enterprise did not appropriately enforce scope for local tokens issued by a primary data center, where replication to a secondary data center was not enabled. Introduced in 1.4.0, fixed in 1.6.6 and 1.7.4.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-13170` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

consul - 1.7.4+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: consul package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.7.4+dfsg1-1').
